text: Does HubSpot have a public repo for default modules? Spotting some accessibility issues that I’d love to contribute to.

Hey Sean — We don’t have a public repo for default modules. But I’d love to hear what you’ve found! We are in the middle of revamping quite a few of the default modules with a big a11y push, but at various paces depending on the modules and upcoming :zipper_mouth_face: updates. Feel free to DM me or post here what you’ve found!
